About Me

Hi, I am a Ph.D. student in Computer Science at State Key Laboratory of Internet of Things for Smart City (SKL-IOTSC), University of Macau. I received my Bachelor degree in Shanghai University, 2015 and Master degree in University of Macau, 2018. My supervisor is Leong hou U from 2015. My research interests consist of graph mining, machine learning and stable marriage problem.
